meanings.definition: A person who studies or practices demonology.
meanings.sent1: The demonologists conducted research on different types of demons.
meanings.sent2: The demonologists were called upon to investigate the haunted house.
meanings.sent3: The demonologists joked that they needed a demon repellent spray.
meanings.sent4: The demonologists delved into the dark world of demon lore.
meanings.sent5: The demonologists' knowledge of demons was unmatched in the field.

meanings.definition: Those who specialize in the study of demons.
meanings.sent1: The team of demonologists traveled the world to uncover ancient demon secrets.
meanings.sent2: Many demonologists believe in the existence of malevolent spirits.
meanings.sent3: During Halloween, the demonologists dressed up as friendly demons for fun.
meanings.sent4: The demonologists' dedication to understanding demons was admirable.
meanings.sent5: In the dark library, the demonologists pored over ancient texts about demons.
